entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 5:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ENE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow except rain over southern sections this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
